thread.title: US teams look for future Paralympians at scouting combines
thread.title_full: US teams look for future Paralympians at scouting combines

title: US teams look for future Paralympians at scouting combines
text:
> Top News US teams look for future Paralympians at scouting combines In this Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015 photo, high school freshman Matthew Freitas, of Weymouth, Mass., talks on the sidelines during a game of flag football, in Weymouth. Freitas lost part of a leg in a car accident, but is now one of scores of disabled athletes being groomed by Adaptive Sports. (AP Photo/Steven Senne) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
